overview: Douglas Klinger is President of Bee Mountain LLC. He is an investor, Board member and consultant to companies and fund managers in the healthcare services, internet media and enterprise software sectors. He is a member of the Board of Directors of Zintro.com and a member of the Advisory Boards of Orwik.com, iAMscientist.com, YS Interactive Media, Humantelligence, Anthurium Solutions, and Personforce.com. Mr. Klinger was previously President of Monster.com and a member of the Board of Directors of WebVet.com and Medcommons. Until late-2012, Doug was Chief Executive Officer of LifeCare, Inc., the leader in the Employee Productivity & Loyalty industry. He was also the President of CIGNA Health Services, a $6 billion diversified specialty healthcare services company. Mr. Klinger was also the President and CEO of CIGNA Dental Health, Senior Vice President of CIGNA Retirement and Investment Services, and a Managing Director of PNC Financial Services Group.
